attributes.action: Ensure that the elderly have the same rights in care homes as children or animals
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Following yesterdays Panorama programme, it appears that the elderly in care have no rights, this needs to change. Where there has been negligence this needs to be prosecutable as it would be for animals or children

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
